root.name: Reign: Conflict of Nations
root.description: OverviewIn Reign: Conflict of Nations, the player has to control 1 of 26 duchies in Medieval Eastern Europe, and must follow objectives to try and build up the largest Empire. Of course, the player can ignore these objectives and play in any way he deems fit; conquering, befriending, settling, etc.PC System RequirementsMinimum:OS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: Intel Pentium 2.4 GHz or similarMemory: 512 MB (768 Mb for Windows Vista)Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 6600 or ATI Radeon X650 with 128 MB, DirectX 9.0 compatibleAudio Card: DirectX 9.0 compatibleHDD: 2 GB free HD spaceRecommended:OS: Windows XP/VistaProcessor: Intel Pentium IV 2.4 GHz, AMD Athlon 64 2800+ or Intel Pentium 1.8Ghz Dual Core and higherMemory: 1 GB (2GB for Windows Vista)Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 7800 or ATI Radeon X1800 with 256 MB, DirectX 9.0 compatibleAudio Card: DirectX 9.0 compatibleHDD: 2 GB free HD space
